control_board.name: PBE
control_board.status_function: if (!message.startsWith("FE0B")) { return null; } const parts = parseHexMessage(message); if (parts.length < 47) { return null; } const p1Target = convertTemperature(parts, 2); const p2Target = convertTemperature(parts, 5); const status = { p1Target: p1Target !== 000 && p1Target !== 960 ? p1Target : null, p2Target: p2Target !== 000 && p2Target !== 960 ? p2Target : null, p1Temp: convertTemperature(parts, 8), p2Temp: convertTemperature(parts, 11), p3Temp: convertTemperature(parts, 14), p4Temp: convertTemperature(parts, 17), smokerActTemp: convertTemperature(parts, 20), moduleIsOn: parts[27] === 1, err1: parts[28] === 1, err2: parts[29] === 1, err3: parts[30] === 1, highTempErr: parts[31] === 1, fanErr: parts[32] === 1, hotErr: parts[33] === 1, motorErr: parts[34] === 1, noPellets: parts[35] === 1, erL: parts[36] === 1, fanState: parts[37] === 1, hotState: parts[38] === 1, motorState: parts[39] === 1, lightState: parts[40] === 1, primeState: parts[41] === 1, isFahrenheit: parts[42] === 1, recipeStep: parts[43], recipeTime: parts[44] * 3600 + parts[45] * 60 + parts[46], }; switch (parts[26]) { case 1: status.grillSetTemp = convertTemperature(parts, 23); break; case 2: status.grillTemp = convertTemperature(parts, 23); break; } return status;
control_board.temperature_function: if (!message.startsWith("FE0C")) { return null; } const parts = parseHexMessage(message); if (parts.length < 30) { return null; } const p1Target = convertTemperature(parts, 2); const p2Target = convertTemperature(parts, 5); return { p1Target: p1Target !== 000 && p1Target !== 960 ? p1Target : null, p2Target: p2Target !== 000 && p2Target !== 960 ? p2Target : null, p1Temp: convertTemperature(parts, 8), p2Temp: convertTemperature(parts, 11), p3Temp: convertTemperature(parts, 14), p4Temp: convertTemperature(parts, 17), grillSetTemp: convertTemperature(parts, 23), grillTemp: convertTemperature(parts, 26), smokerActTemp: convertTemperature(parts, 20), isFahrenheit: parts[29] === 1, };
